channel.title: Parish News on Steve Hemingway's website
channel.description: Recent content in Parish News on Steve Hemingway's website

item.title: My May 2017 Newsletter for the Knebworth Parish News
item.description: Local Plan Update In March officers at NHDC finished cataloguing the 5,675 responses to the Local Plan consultation from last year. The role of NHDC in that consultation was only to collect and organize the responses, and to make sure the correct procedure was followed, as part of the overall, multi-stage process as set out by legislation that must be followed to arrive at a Local Plan. The next step is the submission to the Secretary of State for Communities and Local Government, for the plan to be reviewed by the government.
